site_tagline: Researching lifelike dynamics, synthetic ecologies, and adaptive systems at the University of Vienna.
meta_description: The Artificial Life Institute at the University of Vienna studies lifelike dynamics, synthetic ecologies, and adaptive systems across computation, biology, and philosophy.
contact_blurb: We welcome collaborations, visiting scholars, and student researchers interested in artificial life, complex systems, and emergent behavior.
footer_note: University of Vienna · Faculty of Computer Science
